guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"2345b","text":"Always work under sterile conditions when handling sterile media or stocks. Work under the clean bench.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: cyanobacteria, Synechocystis, Synechococcus, culture, media, medium, BG11

{"blocks":[{"key":"fcsr9","text":"Prepare 1.5 % agar: Weigh 4.5 g Bacto Agar. Fill up to 300 mL. Autoclave.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cf73j","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2i0re","text":"Microwave agar until liquid. {"blocks":[{"key":"135p8","text":"In a 50 mL Falcon, add 1 vol 2x BG11 and 1 vol liquid 1.5 % agar. (Note: Usually, one plate requires 30-40 mL total volume.)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ch0e3","text":"When mixture is hand warm, add appropriate antibiotics, if required. Quickly pour plate, avoiding air bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
